author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed a bug in handling of the 'cursor' property.
2) createSVGTransform now returns a transform with a type of MATRIX.

author: deweese
msg: 1) 'getCssText()' on style that have URI's does not return the
absolute version of the URI it returns the original css Text.
It does return the absolute version for getStringValue().
